name: The Mystery of Amina Locke: Beauty is Murderous (Demo)
name_original: The Mystery of Amina Locke: Beauty is Murderous (Demo)
description: The Mystery Of Amina Locke: Beauty is Murderous is a 2D side-scroller adventure game telling the story of Amina Locke; a retired beauty queen-become detective who is summoned back to her hometown of Ashbourne to solve the mystery behind a chain of murders all connected to the “Miss Ashbourne” Beauty Pageant. While Amina uncovers the truth behind the murders, she also uncovers that she is deeply involved with the killer on the run; all murders seemingly relating to an incident that occurred 8 years ago which caused her to leave the town…an incident Amina seemingly does not recall. As the story unfolds, Amina must face the truth of her past to be able to save more victims from a grisly fate. With only a few days given to her by the killer to find their identity before more people are murdered and her secret is exposed, will Amina be able to solve her own mystery?
